doc:
Nichelle Nichols https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nichelle_Nichols 0 Nichelle Nichols (born Grace Dell Nichols; December 28, 1932) is an American actress, singer, and voice artist. She sang with Duke Ellington and Lionel Hampton before turning to acting. Nichols played communications officer Lieutenant (later, Commander) Uhura aboard the USS Enterprise in the Star Trek television series (1966–1969), as well as the succeeding motion pictures. Nichols's role was groundbreaking as one of the first African American female characters on American television not portrayed as a servant. She also worked to recruit diverse astronauts to NASA, including women and ethnic minorities. Nichelle_Nichols ( born Grace_Dell_Nichols ; December_28_,_1932 ) is an_American_actress , singer , and voice_artist . She sang with Duke_Ellington and Lionel_Hampton before turning to acting . Nichols played communications_officer_Lieutenant_( later , Commander_)_Uhura aboard the_USS_Enterprise in the_Star_Trek_television_series_(_1966 – 1969_) , as_well_as the_succeeding_motion_pictures . Nichols 's_role was_groundbreaking as one of the_first_African_American_female_characters on American_television not_portrayed as a_servant . She also worked_to_recruit diverse_astronauts to NASA , including_women and ethnic_minorities .
